inputs.name: sellAsset
inputs.description: Asset (as registered in Asset registrar) to be sold

inputs.name: buyAsset
inputs.description: Asset (as registered in Asset registrar) to be bought

inputs.name: sellQuantity
inputs.description: Quantity of sellAsset to be sold

inputs.name: buyQuantity
inputs.description: Quantity of buyAsset to be bought

abiDocs.name: makeOrder
abiDocs.details: Only use this in context of a delegatecall, as spending of sellAsset need to be approved first
abiDocs.notice: Makes an order on the given exchange

abiDocs.name: cancelOrder
abiDocs.details: Only use this in context of a delegatecall, as spending of sellAsset need to be approved first
abiDocs.return: Whether the order is successfully cancelled
abiDocs.notice: Cancels an order on the given exchange

inputs.name: quantity
inputs.description: Quantity of order to be executed (For partial taking)

abiDocs.name: takeOrder
abiDocs.details: For this subset of adapter no immediate settlement can be expected
abiDocs.return: Whether the takeOrder is successfully executed
abiDocs.notice: Takes an order on the given exchange
